overview: From 2025-11-04 to 2025-11-05, elizaos/eliza had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 17 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Support Tasks
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: * Collaborate with CJ on anonymous ID + free inference architecture.

topIssues.title: Voice Infrastructure
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Test browser-based voice generation (client-side).
* Prepare optional **server voice endpoint** for paid users.
* Support Compute embeddings integration.

topIssues.title: Plugin-Cloud Testing
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Test plugin-cloud within Eliza Framework.
* Verify tool registration + documentation accuracy.

topIssues.title: Docs
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Build new /docs UI (public, not auth-locked).
* Include:
  * OpenAI-style API explorer.
  * Character setup & API key usage examples.
  * Overview of Cloud architecture.

topIssues.title: Eliza Chat
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Debug and finalize agent chat responsiveness (speed, model routing).
* Fix async model issues (switch to faster models via Groq / Kimi).
* Ensure inference reliability and log monitoring.

topPRs.title: feat: x402 middleware
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
pulled enhanced response & health check from Otaku


<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Introduces x402 payment protection for plugin routes (EVM/Solana), adds core payment types, integrates verification and x402scan 402 responses, plus config registry, docs, and tests.
> 
> - **Server (x402 middleware)**:
>   - Add payment middleware (`x402/`) with EVM (EIP-712/ERC-3009) and Solana verification, facilitator payment ID support, and x402scan-compliant 402 responses.
>   - Integrate into plugin routing to auto-wrap routes with `x402` config (`createPaymentAwareHandler`, `applyPaymentProtection`).
>   - Expose middleware/types via `middleware/index.ts` and `x402/index.ts`.
> - **Core Types**:
>   - Add payment types (`PaymentEnabledRoute`, `X402Config`, validators, OpenAPI helpers) in `@elizaos/core` (`types/payment.ts` and export in `types/index.ts`).
> - **Config & Utilities**:
>   - Add payment config registry (`payment-config.ts`) with built-in configs (`base_usdc`, `solana_usdc`, `polygon_usdc`), CAIP-19 generation, pricing helpers, health reporting.
>   - Define strict x402 schemas (`x402-types.ts`) and request/response/runtime types (`types.ts`).
> - **API Integration**:
>   - Update `api/index.ts` to use payment-aware handlers for plugin routes.
> - **Docs & Tests**:
>   - Add comprehensive README for x402 usage.
>   - Add extensive tests for amount conversion, verification logic, integration, config, and schema validation.
> - **Dependencies**:
>   - Add `viem`, `@solana/web3.js`, and `cors` to server; lockfile updates.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit d64e2a5e1045bc204ffb435d0ef74a044efe1287. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

topPRs.title: feat: Framework for adjusting prompts to best fix model contexts
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
# Risks

Low, new feature, uses some memory but I put configurable limit on it

# Background

## What does this PR do?

It add a dynamic prompt execution system

## What kind of change is this?

Features (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

## Why are we doing this? Any context or related work?

People may use models with lower context and get hallucination, this helps detect when the context is blown out.

# Documentation changes needed?

My changes require a change to the project documentation.

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Introduces a schema-based dynamic prompt executor with validation/retries/metrics and replaces ad-hoc prompting in message flows, plus supporting types/utils and test updates.
> 
> - **Core Runtime**:
>   - Add `runtime.dynamicPromptExecFromState(...)` for schema-driven prompt execution (XML/JSON parsing, UUID validation codes, retries, Handlebars state injection, token estimations).
>   - Track execution metrics via `modelSchemaMetrics` and `modelMetrics` with optional LRU eviction (`DYNAMIC_PROMPT_MAX_ENTRIES`) and retry policy (`VALIDATION_LEVEL`).
>   - Expose metrics getters/clearers; helper methods for cache/keys; minor logging adjustments.
> - **Message Service**:
>   - Replace manual `useModel` + XML parsing with `dynamicPromptExecFromState` in:
>     - `shouldRespond` evaluation (small model).
>     - Single-shot handler (requires `thought`, `actions`).
>     - Multi-step decision loop and final summary.
>   - Improve error logging and minor flow tweaks.
> - **Types/Utils**:
>   - Export `SchemaRow` and `State` from `types`; extend `IAgentRuntime` with `dynamicPromptExecFromState`.
>   - Export `upgradeDoubleToTriple` and `composeRandomUser` from `utils`.
> - **Tests/Test Utils**:
>   - Update `message-service` tests to mock `dynamicPromptExecFromState` responses.
>   - Add mock implementation in test runtime; minor logger formatting changes.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 5905b5f9ab86dd7b7d727d92060575f42a8fc707. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
